page.title: 06SCHOOL AND VILLAGE YEAR 2
page.content: There is always a day-long educational outing in the summer,near the end of the summer term.The children also each invite an elderly person to tea in school.The school organises a { {Village Concert.}The children take part as well as other local people.We swim each week all through the year.The school owns a B.B.C.computer. School clubs are Recorder,Computer, Maths and Games.We have an end-of-year service in church,when parents, Governors and children all take part. During the summer term 5 or 6 children make an exchange with children from a school outside the county.The children are "matched" and stay with their "friend" and go to school for the week with him or her. Special activities are arranged in each school when the children make their visits.
